I have a love & hate relationship with this game. Besides all the bugs and the toxic community, the game can be fun when you want it to be. Personally, I play this game for fun, if I loose, I loose but I try my best either side, killer or survivor. As a killer main, the MMR is a joke but what can we do? Until BHVR changes, we will still be upset with this game lmao. There is good and bad games, there is nice survivors and there is bad survivors, there is nice killers and there is bad killers. That is part of the game.

Honestly happy this game came this far, with content coming out every 3/4 months, but the bugs are a joke, they do need to be fixed but possibly won't be.

Get the game on sale. I do recommend this game.

[h1] Negligent Devs, Flawed Gameplay, EVERYTHING is Toxic - But We Return to an Abusive Game Relationship. 6/10 [/h1]

It barely gets the recommend mark. But it's complicated. This really is an abusive relationship I have with this game.

[b] Graphics [/b]
- Way too much graphical power for a simple end result
- Many graphical 'oopsies' and amateurish detailing leaves a lot to be desired (e.g. being hooked clearly doesn't show itself to be penetrating the character - collision detection problems)
+ DBD has its own stylistic art and animations,  particularly in its interface
- Stop reworking the damn characters, they look fine.
+ The killer designs are surprisingly nice in places
- Lack of iconic maps many users in Reddit forums have suggested e.g. Silent Hill fog town, Trickster Neon City map and more.

[b] Story / Lore [/b]
- Lore is incredibly lengthy and obtuse
- Many character bios end with "BuT thEy SuDdEnlY wEnT MiSsInG?!??"
+ Is probably mildly rewarding if you spend time to get in touch with the archives, tapes and bios

[b] Gameplay [/b]
This part is big so read carefully if interested

+ We all love levelling up characters and killers
- We don't love spending 200 hours just to get 4 people to a decent level with decent perks
+ Can play as killer or survivors and some are from licensed franchises
- Obvious attempt from devs to cashgrab everyone
+ Gameplay functions as a tense experience as survivor when it works right
- It will probably rarely work right. Lots of bugs, or toxic players or some maps certainly spell a game over.
+ Some events which mean some bonuses can be had at times
- Devs outright insult its players with stingy rewards and underwhelming releases
- Devs insult players further with buggy and 'NFT'-related DLC controversy and issues
- Matchmaking will suddenly pit you against insanely difficult killers for some reason
- Entire chase and success of the games rely on exploits and rather silly vault, pallet drop and group protection tactics. It feels extremely contrived and stiff.
- Characters don't know how to run, only jog as if it's their Sunday off work.
+ Killer 'terror radius' is genuinely scary to experience at first
- TERRIBLE grind as mentioned but to get new killers and characters which are unlicensed costs MANY 'shards' (obtained by levelling up) and will take you HOURS.
- Indirect / direct pressure to spend irl money to obtain decent characters, perks and killers to give you a sporting chance in higher ranks

[b] Soundtrack / OST / Audio [/b]

- Underwhelming variety of horror tracks
- Character screams when being hooked clearly 'fade out' as a cheap way of game design. Listen to it carefully and you'll hear their screams only fade out very quickly rather than end the way a scream should.
+ Some tracks are true to its roots such as Michael Myers' halloween theme
+ Directional stereo sound as killer in order to focus the player to hear potential victims.

[b] Characters [/b]

+ Nice bit of famous horror killers to keep players smiling (probably)
+ Some well-known survivors from franchises
- Limited survivors from franchises
- HUGE DLC problems where bugs are concerned. See: Pinhead voice lines removed

[b] Conclusion [/b]

Big problems in its core mechanics and noticeably what players have accepted to be its bread and butter in chase sequences and the way the devs neglect improving this game. The grind is too long and it probably won't improve substantially until a competitor threatens DBD as king.

Try it. Play it. Spend 200 hours on it if you want. But put the game down if it's ruining your mood - because some of these games WILL do that.

Если говорить откровенно, то игра и задумка интересная...  Но блять разрабы вы серьезно?
Куча багов и с каждой обновой их становится ещё больше (прошел бета-тест патча а вы выпускаете их в релиз не доработанные (последнее патч это - скил ведьмы и 3 карты в минус)). Вроде бы все хорошо это я ещё не говорю про токсичное комьюнити... Система матчмйкинга просто убивает, то есть если ты ман пепел 4 или ещё хуже если ты новичок забросят тебя к задротам радужный 1 и при чем почти в каждой игре - проигрывай все игры, так же и на оборот токсичность манов, проявляющаяся в тонелерстве и кемперстве, проявляющаяся в надежде что бы кого-то вынести вообще убивает желание играть. Токсичность сурвов в пати вообще убивает желание играть: шкафы, осколки, палетки и фонари на лицо, приседание, дикие генраши... Осталось только обоссать бедного мана. Однообразные, скучные и унылые ивенты, гринд уровней на персонажа - это вообще отдельная унылая история, качаться вечность. Некоторые подношения и вовсе потеряли всякий смысл, а переработки так и не идут. Недавно вновь зашел в игру... и что в итоге - опять диссинхрон ( либо с валютой траблы либо траблы с облачным сохранением). И вишенка на торте: как вы думаете, что могли придумать разрабы? Правильно DBD mobile. Куча багов, не оптимизирована, ну и как же без читов. А на основное детище забили болта. Как итог, за прошедшие 5 лет игры я могу сказать только одно: новичкам играть я вовсе не советую, ну или можно просто скоротать время или пофаниться с друзьями, покупать длс и скины на персов я и вовсе молчу - пустая трата денег...
P.S. Разрабам, если вы вообще читаете коменты и не забиваете на них болт или просто баните аккаунт за пропаганду: исправляйтесь, а то однажды игра потеряет смысл и из неё будут уходить люди, а вследствии сего игра в скором времени умрет, а мы тем временем ждем очередное обновление с кучей багов по итогу в релизе... С любовью, Весёлый Пикачу.

Bueenoo, si te gusta estar con el cul0 en la mano y los eggs en la garganta este juego te va a encantar, diseñado para masoquistas que no tienen amor propio, donde mientras el asesino se ríe y te persigue, tú estas gritando como becerro con los músculos contraídos.

Ya bien, el juego es versátil, te permite divertirte con tus amigos o en solitario como asesino, aunque realmente hay asesinos que son poderosos y es difícil ganarles. Buena temática y personajes de otras sagas o inspirados.

Contras: Las perks buenas las tienen personajes que tienes que comprar con dinero (o con una moneda del juego que te tardarías un muy buen rato)., Todas las partidas son clasificatorias, por lo que tener una mala partida te afecta y tiltea.

En fin, me gusta y es divertido poder jugar con personajes de otros juegos y series de terror, recomiendo comprar dlc's cuando esten en oferta junto con el juego.

Só recomendo por ser um jogo divertido, capaz de te fazer querer jogar constantemente. É uma jogo simples de aprender a jogar, além de ser também mais divertido de ser jogado junto de amigos. Algumas DLCs envolvem personagens conhecidos de filmes de terror famosos, e também deixam o jogo bem mais divertido.

O único problema é que o jogo é bem mal otimizado, nem vale a pena querer jogá-lo com as melhores configurações gráficas nem mesmo tendo um PC com requisitos mínimos de última geração. Além disso, todo santo update te obriga a reinstalar o jogo, um processo que demora horas por ser um jogo meio pesadinho. Recomendo comprar e jogar apenas se você está disposto a "ignorar e aceitar" esse detalhe chatinho.

Не игра, а помойка. Разрабы кладут огромный болт на баланс. Добавляют сурвам имбовые тотемы, делая вид что никто не сидит в ДС. 70% сурвов (особенно под вечер) играют в пати. Ты ничего не можешь против них сделать. Тебе генрашат все 5 генераторов минут за 7. Палет на каждой карте штук 20-30. Так ещё и респа всегда под сурвов располагает. Короче, сдесь нет баланса. Тут есть баги, сурвы в дс канале и туча багов

Really bad matchmaking - seems like you're always facing top ranked players. Entire match would pass as killer where you won't get a single kill despite like REALLY trying.  

Survivors in this game are not afraid of the killer whatsoever and you''ll find yourself getting bullied all the time by four other players if you play killer. Survivor perks are way too strong in that they have perks that will often save them when you do catch them. Collision models are bad, survivors can via the collision model push the killer off course when chasing someone which goes to show the bias. 

It's just garbage. Even after taking a break from it, coming back after some months, it's still cringe. 

It's not an expensive game, but honestly I would not endorse or condone what the developers are doing here. Pass . Not a good game.

PANQUEQUES CON MANJAR
Ingredientes:
1 1/2 Taza de leche semidescremada
2 Huevos
1 Cucharada de aceite
1 1/2 Taza de harina cernida
12 Cucharadas de manjar

Instrucciones:
Paso 1
1.- Junta todos los ingredientes en el jarro de una juguera vertiendo primero los liquidos como la leche, huevos y aceite y al final los secos (de este modo será más fácil integrar todo), menos el manjar. Procesa a velocidad media durante unos segundos hasta conseguir un batido homogéneo.

Paso 2
2.- Luego calienta una sartén de teflón o antiadherente de diametro mediano, vierte ¾ de un cucharón y distribuye por toda la sartén con movimientos circulares e inclinados con el mango de la sartén. Cocina durante unos segundos hasta dorar sus bordes y voltea. Cocina unos segundos mas y repite el procedimiento hasta acabar la mezcla.

Paso 3
3.- Una vez listos, rellénalos uno a uno con una cucharada de manjar y enróllalos sobre sí mismos, espolvorea azúcar flor y sírvelos de inmediato fríos o calientes como más te guste.

Tips:
Acompañamiento: Puedes servirlos tibios y agregar una bola de helado sabor vainilla para dar un contraste de temperaturas y hacer de esta receta más rica.

总体而言是个对人类玩家友好，对杀手玩家恶劣的游戏，至少就2021年10月28日的更新为止，白银局很多时候是人类追着杀手蹭分，很多时候杀手甚至连鱼死网破的机会都没有（但就以白银局杀手来说）。我是被杀手所吸引的，最后改去玩人类的，从一开始的听见心跳紧张到躲角落，和现在的等杀手到脸上蹲两下再开溜，我只能说，我有罪（入手前就已经看了两年视频，所以我适应的特别快），现在的杀鸡特别大的缺点就是杀手玩家的体验太差了，除非是遇见萌新，不然大概率会被溜爆，这个版本修机太快了，作为一个人类玩家我感觉很爽，但是我一玩杀手，我也会马上蒙逼，一挂三台机，或者两挂三台机是日常。同时杀鸡的匹配机制问题很大，我一个白银3（忘了是二还是三了）和三白银队友，遇见一个红3的护士（不知道为什么感觉不是特别厉害）我溜了他3台机，然后还甩掉他了，可能是不玩的护士的吧（？）。虽然最后还是被杀了两个，不过很显然，技术已经顶不住人类的速修了。但是几个版本前的毁灭还是太过于萌新杀手了，只要不是完美QTE就是倒退，希望官方能找到一个平衡人屠的办法吧XDDD
